title: Bench 14
description: Inspired by the Nelson Platform Bench, this bench is made from and uses every part of a single sheet of plywood. It's assembled without screws, nails or glue and can easily flat-pack into a 1.5' x 8' sheet three inches thick. This project is the culmination of extended explorations into efficient furniture production and assembly methods. Collaboration with Evan Finkle

captions.11: Sketch of a bench / shelving unit with a similar visual vocabulary
captions.7: Disassembled, the bench takes up only as much space as a sheet of plywood.
